wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Kane is an American football coach and former player. He is currently the associate head coach and outside linebackers coach at the University of Illinois.

response: * Kevin Kane (LB, 2002–05), Illinois assistant head coach and outside linebackers coach

In their search for a new football coach, NIU's potential candidates included Baltimore Ravens RB coach Thomas Hammock (former NIU RB), former Maryland OC Matt Canada (former NIU OC), SMU DC Kevin Kane (former NIU DC), and Wisconsin OC Joe Rudolph.
* Kevin Kane (American football) (born 1983), American football coach and former player
* Kevin Kane (musician), Canadian songwriter, musician, and record producer
